text: Glen Anthony Doherty (July 10, 1970 - September 11, 2012) was an American writer and security officer. He died in the 2012 U.S. diplomatic missions attacks in Benghazi, Libya. Doherty was born in Winchester, Massachusetts, and studied at Winchester High School. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American murder victims Category:Writers from Massachusetts Category:People from Winchester, Massachusetts
title: Glen Doherty
